insertCompany: INSERT INTO company( name, company_website, fk_company_size) VALUES ($1, $2, $3) RETURNING pk_id
insertEmployee: INSERT INTO employee(firstname, lastname, account_type, fk_company_id, telephone_number, fk_role_id) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6) RETURNING pk_id
validateCompanySize: SELECT pk_id FROM companysize WHERE pk_id = $1
validateRole: SELECT pk_id FROM role WHERE pk_id=$1
